countries: 490, Antigua and Barbuda, Austria, Brazil, Cambodia, Cook Islands, Costa Rica, Dominica, Gambia, Gibraltar, Grenada, Guinea, Mongolia, Nicaragua, Palau, Papua New Guinea, Saint Kitts and Nevis, Saint Lucia, Saint Vincent and the Grenadines, Samoa, Sao Tome and Principe, Sint Maarten (Dutch part), Zambia, Zimbabwe

countries: Aruba, Bolivia, Plurinational State of, Botswana, Cabo Verde, Cayman Islands, Christmas Island, Greenland, Jordan, Kuwait, Maldives, Montserrat, Pitcairn, Saint Pierre and Miquelon, Seychelles, Sudan, Tonga

grouping_name: Resource exporters with narrow import needs
countries: Algeria, Brunei Darussalam, Cameroon, Comoros, Equatorial Guinea, Guyana, Haiti, Norfolk Island, Solomon Islands, Vanuatu
explanation: Hydrocarbon/primary exporters that import mostly capital goods, machinery, and refined consumer products.

countries: 579, Albania, Angola, Azerbaijan, Bahrain, Bermuda, Bulgaria, Chile, Cyprus, Czechia, Denmark, Dominican Republic, Ethiopia, Germany, Guinea-Bissau, Hungary, Iraq, Japan, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Moldova, Republic of, Mozambique, New Zealand, Nigeria, Pakistan, Poland, Serbia, Slovenia, Sweden, Tuvalu, Virgin Islands, British, Yemen

Specific import needs, not broad; often geopolitically driven import structures.

countries: 251, 699, 842, Belgium, Colombia, Congo, Cuba, Greece, Indonesia, Ireland, Italy, Libya, Malawi, Malaysia, Mali, Malta, Morocco, Niger, Palestine, State of, Portugal, Romania, Rwanda, San Marino, Sierra Leone, Singapore, South Africa, Spain, Syrian Arab Republic, Togo, Tunisia, United Kingdom, Viet Nam
